channel.title: Freshman Friday
channel.description: Freshman Friday this week. Share stories below, and tell me what to expect. My school is roughly 45% white, 15% Asian, 30% black and 10% other, if that makes a difference.

Nothing ever happens end of story.

[/quote]

No shit lol. At my school we didn’t need a specific day to fuck with kids we did it whenever we wanted.[/quote]

Freshman aren’t really fucked with on any day except what i’ve heard about this day.
Idk all schools are different.

I see. How old are freshmans?[/quote]

14-15… Ever heard of junior high/high school/what ever its called in England?

item.title: Freshman Friday
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:8, topic:362935"][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=459208.msg3359958#msg3359958 date=1286256074]

if you aren’t a wimp/asshole/annoying kid i doubt anything will happen to you.

You can’t call him a wimp if you aren’t even old enough to go to highschool.
[/quote]when did i say he is a wimp? and ya i am in highschool. quit trying to act cool, seriously nobody on this site likes you…

Don’t get so butthurt, i was doing what you used to, it’s called trolling.

[img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/PictureorVideo003.jpg[/im g]

Grade 9 i think?[/quote]that pic is nearly 3 yrs old hahaha! omg lololol. and im not getting butt hurt. just defending myself. ur pretty pathetic lol

Read full topic

item.title: Freshman Friday
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Wear an AC/DC, Metallica, Van Halen, BFMV, Led Zeppelin, Megadeth, Guns ‘N’ Roses, Dio, or any other 80s metal band shirt and that way if someone beats you up I can have a reason to come and kick their ass.

Read full topic
